email_content:
Hello SoftSync Systems Project Management Team,

I hope you’re doing well.

As discussed, Acme Corp. is excited to move forward with the Performance Tracking System (PTS). Below is a concise summary of the core requirements and agreed-upon parameters gathered from our internal notes so far:

1. Core Functionality
   • Real-Time Performance Metrics – live dashboards for KPIs such as project completion rate, sales target attainment, and customer-service response times.
   • Customizable Dashboards – role-based widgets so managers and employees can pin the metrics most relevant to them.
   • HRIS Integration – direct, secure connection to Acme’s existing HR system for unified employee data (training records, role changes, past reviews, etc.).

2. Technical & Security Expectations
   • Single-sign-on (SSO) via Azure AD.
   • Data encryption in transit (TLS 1.2+) and at rest (AES-256).
   • GDPR & CCPA compliance; no employee-identifiable data stored outside approved regions.

3. Project Timeline
   • Development Kick-Off: Next quarter (early July, exact date TBD).
   • Pilot Phase: 6-month user-testing window beginning immediately after MVP hand-off (target January release to pilot group).
   • Company-wide Roll-Out: Following successful pilot, tentatively Q3 of next year.

4. Deliverables
   • Requirements traceability matrix.
   • Technical architecture diagram & API spec.
   • MVP demo (end of sprint 4).
   • Pilot feedback report & feature-adjustment plan.

5. Collaboration & Communication
   • Weekly stand-up (Tuesdays @ 10:00 AM ET) – please confirm availability.
   • Slack channel #pts-delivery for day-to-day coordination.
   • Monthly steering-committee review with Acme leadership.

Action Items for SoftSync Systems:
   1. Confirm the above scope and milestone dates, or propose alternatives.
   2. Share a preliminary resource plan, including lead engineer and UX designer.
   3. Provide an integration questionnaire so our HRIS team can supply connection specs ahead of sprint 1.

Please let me know if any details need clarification. Once we receive your confirmation, we’ll issue the formal statement of work and schedule the kick-off.

Thank you, and looking forward to partnering on this project.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
Product Lead – Acme Corp.
+1 (555) 123-4567
